data.title: What if FH2 had a Burnout radio?
data.meta_description:
Copyright… that’s what would happen. 
But I decided to see what it would be like to race with a few tracks from Burnout Revenge/Paradise. (Also, all designs/emblems on my car are made by me.) Tell me what you guys think! …
data.text:
Copyright… that’s what would happen.

But I decided to see what it would be like to race with a few tracks from Burnout Revenge/Paradise. (Also, all designs/emblems on my car are made by me.) Tell me what you guys think!
